import axios from"axios";export var GET_HABITS="GET_HABITS";export var getHabits=function getHabits(num){return function(dispatch){return axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"api/list_habits/")).then(function(res){console.log("/api/list_habits result ",res.data);//const array = res.data.slice(0, num);
dispatch({type:GET_HABITS,payload:res.data.habits});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};
